face","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"unpause","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"usedNonces","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"wrappedTokens","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@notice This contract facilitates locking, minting, burning, and claiming tokens across different blockchains. It supports native ETH and ERC20 tokens, including permit-based transfers. It uses role-based access control for security with pausing capabilities.","details":"Integrates OpenZeppelin's AccessControl, ReentrancyGuard, Pausable, and ECDSA utilities. Bridge nonces are used to prevent replay attacks across chains.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ECDSAInvalidSignature()":[{"details":"The signature derives the `address(0)`."}],"ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256)":[{"details":"The signature has an invalid length."}],"ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32)":[{"details":"The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"burnWrappedForReturn(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emits TokenBurned eventReverts if paused, zero addresses, zero amount, or token unregistered","params":{"amount":"Amount to burn","nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay","targetChainId":"Chain ID where tokens will be returned","targetToken":"Original token address expected on source chain","wrappedToken":"Wrapped token address"}},"claimOriginalWithSignature(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Marks nonce as used to prevent replayEmits NativeReleased or TokenReleased eventReverts if paused, nonce already used, invalid signature, or token transfer failure","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to claim","nonce":"Unique nonce from source chain operation","signature":"Relayer's signature approving the claim","sourceChainId":"Chain ID where tokens were locked or burned","token":"Original token address (address(0) if native ETH)","user":"Address receiving the tokens"}},"claimWrappedWithSignature(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Marks nonce as used to prevent replayEmits NativeClaimed or TokenClaimed eventReverts if paused, nonce already used, invalid signature, or unregistered wrapped token","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to claim","nonce":"Unique nonce from source chain operation","signature":"Relayer's signature approving the claim","sourceChainId":"Chain ID where tokens were locked or burned","token":"Wrapped token address (address(0) if native ETH)","user":"Address receiving the tokens"}},"emergencyWithdrawETH(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by adminReverts on zero address or zero amountEmits EmergencyETHWithdrawal event","params":{"amount":"Amount of ETH to withdraw","to":"Recipient address for ETH withdrawal"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantPauserRole(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin","params":{"account":"Address to grant pauser role"}},"grantRelayerRole(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin","params":{"account":"Address to grant relayer role"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"lockNative(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emits NativeLocked eventReverts if paused, zero amount, zero or invalid target chain ID","params":{"nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks","targetChainId":"ID of the destination chain"}},"lockToken(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Requires prior approval for token transferEmits TokenLocked eventReverts if paused, zero amount, zero address, zero or invalid target chain ID, or transfer failure","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to lock","nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks","targetChainId":"ID of the destination chain","token":"ERC20 token address"}},"lockTokenWithPermit(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emits TokenLocked eventReverts if paused, zero amount, zero address, zero target chain ID, or transfer failure","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to lock","deadline":"Permit signature deadline","nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks","r":"Signature r parameter","s":"Signature s parameter","targetChainId":"ID of the destination chain","token":"ERC20 token address supporting permit","v":"Signature v parameter"}},"pause()":{"details":"Only callable by pauser role"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"registerWrappedToken(address,address)":{"details":"Only callable by adminReverts if zero addresses or token already registeredEmits WrappedTokenRegistered event","params":{"originalToken":"Address of the original token on source chain","wrappedToken":"Address of the wrapped token on this chain"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokePauserRole(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin","params":{"account":"Address to revoke pauser role"}},"revokeRelayerRole(address)":{"details":"Only callable by admin","params":{"account":"Address to revoke relayer role"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"unpause()":{"details":"Only callable by pauser role"}},"title":"BridgeFactory - Cross-chain Token Bridge Contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"CallerIsNotAdmin()":[{"notice":"Reverts if caller lacks admin privileges"}],"CallerIsNotPauser()":[{"notice":"Reverts if caller lacks pauser privileges"}],"ClaimAlreadyProcessed()":[{"notice":"Reverts if a claim has already been processed with the same nonce"}],"DirectEthTransfersNotSupported()":[{"notice":"Reverts if contract receives direct ETH transfers (not via lock functions)"}],"EmptyTargetChain()":[{"notice":"Reverts if the target chain ID is zero"}],"EthTransferFailed()":[{"notice":"Reverts if ETH transfer fails"}],"InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Reverts if bridge factory has smaler balance than wanted amount"}],"InvalidSignature()":[{"notice":"Reverts if a signature is invalid or signer lacks required role"}],"InvalidTargetChain()":[{"notice":"Reverts if target chain ID equals current chain ID (invalid bridging to same chain)"}],"OriginalTokenAlreadyRegistered()":[{"notice":"Reverts if original token already registered when attempting to register wrapped token"}],"TokenTransferFailed()":[{"notice":"Reverts if an ERC20 token transfer fails"}],"UnregisteredWrappedToken()":[{"notice":"Reverts if a wrapped token is unregistered or unknown"}],"WrappedTokenAlreadyRegistered()":[{"notice":"Reverts if wrapped token already registered when attempting to register again"}],"ZeroAddressProvided()":[{"notice":"Reverts if an address parameter is zero where not allowed"}],"ZeroAmountNotAllowed()":[{"notice":"Reverts if the amount is zero in operations that require positive amounts"}]},"events":{"EmergencyETHWithdrawal(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted on emergency withdrawal of ETH from contract by admin"},"NativeClaimed(address,uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Emitted when native ETH is claimed by a user on destination chain"},"NativeLocked(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when native ETH is locked for bridging"},"NativeReleased(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when native ETH is released back to user on original chain"},"TokenBurned(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when wrapped tokens are burned for returning to original chain"},"TokenClaimed(address,address,uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Emitted when wrapped tokens are claimed by a user"},"TokenLocked(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when tokens are locked for bridging"},"TokenReleased(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when original tokens are released back to user"},"WrappedTokenRegistered(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new wrapped token mapping is registered"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"ADMIN_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for admin accounts with elevated privileges"},"PAUSER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for accounts authorized to pause and unpause contract"},"RELAYER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for relayer accounts authorized to sign claims"},"burnWrappedForReturn(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Burns wrapped tokens for returning original tokens on the source chain"},"claimOriginalWithSignature(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Claims original tokens on this chain using relayer signature verification"},"claimWrappedWithSignature(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Claims wrapped tokens on this chain using relayer signature verification"},"constructor":{"notice":"Contract constructor, grants deployer default roles and sets current chain ID"},"currentChainId()":{"notice":"Immutable chain ID of the current blockchain where this contract is deployed"},"emergencyWithdrawETH(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Allows admin to withdraw stuck ETH from contract in emergencies"},"grantPauserRole(address)":{"notice":"Grants pauser role to an account"},"grantRelayerRole(address)":{"notice":"Grants relayer role to an account"},"lockNative(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Locks native ETH for bridging to another chain"},"lockToken(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Locks ERC20 tokens for bridging to another chain"},"lockTokenWithPermit(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Locks ERC20 tokens using permit to approve and transfer in one call"},"originalTokens(address)":{"notice":"Mapping from wrapped tokens back to their original tokens"},"pause()":{"notice":"Pauses the bridge factory contract, disabling locking, claiming, and burning"},"registerWrappedToken(address,address)":{"notice":"Registers a new mapping between original and wrapped tokens"},"revokePauserRole(address)":{"notice":"Revokes pauser role from an account"},"revokeRelayerRole(address)":{"notice":"Revokes relayer role from an account"},"unpause()":{"notice":"Unpauses the bridge factory contract"},"usedNonces(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Tracks used nonces scoped by user, nonce, and source chain to prevent replay"},"wrappedTokens(address)":{"notice":"Mapping from original burnWrappedForReturn(address,address,uin.details: Emits TokenBurned eventReverts if paused, zero addresses, zero amount, or token unregistered

params.targetChainId: Chain ID where tokens will be returned
params.targetToken: Original token address expected on source chain

claimOriginalWithSignature(address,addre.details: Marks nonce as used to prevent replayEmits NativeReleased or TokenReleased eventReverts if paused, nonce already used, invalid signature, or token transfer failure

params.nonce: Unique nonce from source chain operation
params.sourceChainId: Chain ID where tokens were locked or burned
params.token: Original token address (address(0) if native ETH)

claimWrappedWithSignature(address,addres.details: Marks nonce as used to prevent replayEmits NativeClaimed or TokenClaimed eventReverts if paused, nonce already used, invalid signature, or unregistered wrapped token

params.nonce: Unique nonce from source chain operation
params.sourceChainId: Chain ID where tokens were locked or burned
params.token: Wrapped token address (address(0) if native ETH)

emergencyWithdrawETH(address,uint256).details: Only callable by adminReverts on zero address or zero amountEmits EmergencyETHWithdrawal event

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

lockNative(uint256,uint256).details: Emits NativeLocked eventReverts if paused, zero amount, zero or invalid target chain ID

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks

lockToken(address,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Requires prior approval for token transferEmits TokenLocked eventReverts if paused, zero amount, zero address, zero or invalid target chain ID, or transfer failure

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks

lockTokenWithPermit(address,uint256,uint.details: Emits TokenLocked eventReverts if paused, zero amount, zero address, zero target chain ID, or transfer failure

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

registerWrappedToken(address,address).details: Only callable by adminReverts if zero addresses or token already registeredEmits WrappedTokenRegistered event

params.originalToken: Address of the original token on source chain
params.wrappedToken: Address of the wrapped token on this chain

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

ADMIN_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for admin accounts with elevated privileges

PAUSER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for accounts authorized to pause and unpause contract

RELAYER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for relayer accounts authorized to sign claims

burnWrappedForReturn(address,address,uin.notice: Burns wrapped tokens for returning original tokens on the source chain

claimOriginalWithSignature(address,addre.notice: Claims original tokens on this chain using relayer signature verification

claimWrappedWithSignature(address,addres.notice: Claims wrapped tokens on this chain using relayer signature verification

constructor.notice: Contract constructor, grants deployer default roles and sets current chain ID

currentChainId().notice: Immutable chain ID of the current blockchain where this contract is deployed

emergencyWithdrawETH(address,uint256).notice: Allows admin to withdraw stuck ETH from contract in emergencies

grantPauserRole(address).notice: Grants pauser role to an account

grantRelayerRole(address).notice: Grants relayer role to an account

lockNative(uint256,uint256).notice: Locks native ETH for bridging to another chain

lockToken(address,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Locks ERC20 tokens for bridging to another chain

lockTokenWithPermit(address,uint256,uint.notice: Locks ERC20 tokens using permit to approve and transfer in one call

originalTokens(address).notice: Mapping from wrapped tokens back to their original tokens

pause().notice: Pauses the bridge factory contract, disabling locking, claiming, and burning

registerWrappedToken(address,address).notice: Registers a new mapping between original and wrapped tokens

revokePauserRole(address).notice: Revokes pauser role from an account

revokeRelayerRole(address).notice: Revokes relayer role from an account

usedNonces(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Tracks used nonces scoped by user, nonce, and source chain to prevent replay

wrappedTokens(address).notice: Mapping from original tokens to their wrapped counterparts
